matrix-project.description: Checks if all dependencies of Cloud media are satisfied.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# temporary, similar to update_automation (not that advanced) if [ ! -e /root/github.com/SUSE/cloud/ ] ; then mkdir -p /root/github.com/SUSE pushd /root/github.com/SUSE/ git clone git@github.com:SUSE/cloud.git popd fi pushd /root/github.com/SUSE/cloud/ git pull popd rm -rf cloud/ mkdir -p cloud rsync -av /root/github.com/SUSE/cloud/scripts ./cloud/
# Cleanup isos from old builds rm -f scripts/release-mgmt/*Media1.iso
# options export RPM_DEPCHECK=1 export SRCRPM_DEPCHECK=0
if [[ "$project" == "Devel:Cloud:Shared:11-SP3:Update" ]]; then export RPM_DEPCHECK_MEDIADEPS=" " export SRCRPM_DEPCHECK_MEDIADEPS=" " export INSTALLCHECK_EXTRA_OPTS="--exclude pattern:" fi
OBS_PROJECT=$project stage=$subproject [[ $stage == ":" ]] && stage=
if [ -n "$stage" ]; then if [ "${OBS_PROJECT##*\/}" != "${OBS_PROJECT}" ]; then OBS_PROJECT=${OBS_PROJECT%%\/*}$stage/${OBS_PROJECT##*\/} else OBS_PROJECT=${OBS_PROJECT%%\/*}$stage fi fi
OBS_TYPE=IBS OBS_PROJECT=$OBS_PROJECT make -C cloud/scripts/release-mgmt/ mediacheck RETVAL=$?
# Cleanup rm -r cloud/scripts/release-mgmt/*.iso #if [[ "$OBS_PROJECT" == *Staging ]] ; then # [ $RETVAL -eq 0 ] && automation/scripts/jenkins/jenkins-job-trigger openstack-submit-project -p project="${OBS_PROJECT%:Staging}" subproject="Staging" packagefilter="_product" #fi
